message.description: The message to be displayed on the card

route.description: Route for another release notes page

routeText.description: Text to be clicked to redirect to different route

items.description:
The announcementCard field has three optional fields:
            - route: Route of the page where user will be redirected to when clicked on it.
            - routeText: Label for the route where we want the user to click.
            - emoji: Paste any emoji in this field if required.

announcementCard.description:
The announcementCard field has three optional fields:
            - route: Route of the page where user will be redirected to when clicked on it.
            - routeText: Label for the route where we want the user to click.
            - emoji: Paste any emoji in this field if required.

image.description: URL for the image of the board member

type.description:
This object has the following properties as optional.
- url: External link to redirect the page to when button is pressed.
- route: Route Name of the page to redirect to when the button is pressed.
- icon: icon name for the icon to be displayed on the button.
- styles: Additional styling for the button.

route.description: Route for the another page in current project

anyOf.description:
This object has the following properties as optional.
- url: External link to redirect the page to when button is pressed.
- route: Route Name of the page to redirect to when the button is pressed.
- icon: icon name for the icon to be displayed on the button.
- styles: Additional styling for the button.

width.description: Width of the container for carousel

route.description: Route of the page for the button

alt.description: Alternative text for the carousel image.

items.description:
This object has the following optional fields.
    - url: External Link to redirect to when the button is pressed.
    - route: Name of the route of the page to be loaded when button is pressed.

    Enter either url or route.

carouselInfo.description:
This object has the following optional fields.
    - url: External Link to redirect to when the button is pressed.
    - route: Name of the route of the page to be loaded when button is pressed.

    Enter either url or route.

field.description: Field of work of the contact

url.description: URL/Text to be displayed inside the card

borderColor.description: Border color of card according to the request type

class.description: Class name defined in the css file

type.description:
This object has the following fields as optional.
- displayMetaData: True if you want to display Release Version and Digital Object type. If you set this to true, make sure to add releaseVersion and dot properties in rows object.
- downloadIcon: name of the icon you want to display in download column header
- columnLabels: Object of column definition and column headers for the table

displayMetadata.description: Flag to display the Release Version and Digital Object type

downloadIcon.description: Icon name to display the icon

columnLabels.description: Object of column definition and column header label

label.description: Label for the link in the download column

link.description: URL for the label in the download column

releaseVersion.description: Table Data for release version column.

dot.description: Table data for Digital Object Type column.

url.description: URL for Organ or its type

items.description:
Following properties in this object are optional:
        - releaseVersion: Release version of the organ.
        - dot: Digital object type of the organ.
        - url: External link to be embedded in the organ.

rows.description:
Following properties in this object are optional:
        - releaseVersion: Release version of the organ.
        - dot: Digital object type of the organ.
        - url: External link to be embedded in the organ.

items.description: Add version and rows data for the table

versionedData.description: Add version and rows data for the table

anyOf.description:
This object has the following fields as optional.
- displayMetaData: True if you want to display Release Version and Digital Object type. If you set this to true, make sure to add releaseVersion and dot properties in rows object.
- downloadIcon: name of the icon you want to display in download column header
- columnLabels: Object of column definition and column headers for the table

class.description: Class name of the class defined in the CSS file

anyOf.description: Property 'class' is optional. It is the class name for the image. Define this class in page-element.component.scss

title.description: Title of the image on the card

imageDialog.description: URL of the image to be displayed on the dialog

route.description: Route for the card to be redirected

color.description: Background color for the icon if necessary

items.description:
Properties mentioned here are optional. Either use route or externalLink
- route: route for the page to be redirected
- externalLink: URL of the page to be opened when the card is clicked
- color: background color of the image
- body: Subtitle for the card

longCardItems.description:
Properties mentioned here are optional. Either use route or externalLink
- route: route for the page to be redirected
- externalLink: URL of the page to be opened when the card is clicked
- color: background color of the image
- body: Subtitle for the card

headerSize.description: Inline styles for the title of the card

id.description: Unique ID for the title of the card

items.description:
Properties mentioned here are optional
    - headerSize: Pass inline styles for the header of the card
    - id: Pass id as an attribute to the title of the card

longCardWithTitleData.description:
Properties mentioned here are optional
    - headerSize: Pass inline styles for the header of the card
    - id: Pass id as an attribute to the title of the card

anyOf.description: To add margin around any component. Add top/ bottom/ left/ right and margin value

type.description:
This object has the following fields as optional
- headerInfo: this is the data about column headers and their definition. Add this data if you want to display data table

isMultiRow.description: True if want to display organs one below other. False if want to display organs beside one another

tableRequired.description: True of want to display data table

release.description: Label for release and release date,year

versionData.description:
Release name, source csv file and version number
    Property 'file' is optional. If required, add property 'file' ans pass the path to the CSV file. It is only required if tableRequired is True.

cell.description: Code to display the cell data

isTotalRequired.description: True of want the total to be displayed

alignment.description: Alignment of the data (start or end)

headerInfo.description:
Names of columns and their definitions
        There are three optional values in this object:
        - isTotalRequired: To display total at the end of the table
        - sorting: To enable sorting in the table
        - alignment: start or end to align data left or right

image.description: Path to the Icon/Image of the organ
URL of the image of the Tissue

expandedImage.description: URL of the image of the Tissue when dialog is open

svg.description: URL to download the SVG file of the tissue

ai.description: URL to download the AI file of the tissue

png.description: URL to download the PNG file of the tissue

tissueData.description:
Tissue data for the above organ.
    Following properties are optional in this object.
    - image: URL of the image of the tissue.
    - expandedImage: URL of the image to be shown in the modal, when it is clicked.
    - threeDimImage: URL of the 3D object (.glb) file.
    - alt: Alternate text for the image.
    - url: URL for the metadata button.
    - svg: URL to download the SVG file of the tissue.
    - ai: URL to download the AI file of the tissue.
    - png: URL to download the PNG file of the tissue.

organData.description:
Organ data for the version.
        Property tissueData in this object is optional. Add tissue data to display details about tissues for each organ.

organInfo.description:
This object has the following fields as optional
- headerInfo: this is the data about column headers and their definition. Add this data if you want to display data table

title.description: Title of the card (eg. Position in the competition)

presentedBy.description: Name of the person who presented

items.description:
The following properties are optional in this object:
                - button: Data of buttons to show on the Prize Card.
                - kaggleId: kaggle id's of the winners.

winner.description:
The following properties are optional in this object:
                - button: Data of buttons to show on the Prize Card.
                - kaggleId: kaggle id's of the winners.

alt.description: Alternate text for the org image

items.description:
The following properties are optional in this object:
        - presentedBy: Name of the presenter.
        - orgImage: URL to the image of the organization.
        - userImage: URL(s) to the image of the participants.

prizeCard.description:
The following properties are optional in this object:
        - presentedBy: Name of the presenter.
        - orgImage: URL to the image of the organization.
        - userImage: URL(s) to the image of the participants.

image.description: URL of the Image of the card

gif.description: URL for the GIF on the card

title.description: Message to be displayed inside the tile

type.description:
This object has the following properties as optional:
- id: Label for the id attribute for the component
- class: Class name defined in the css file for this component.

class.description: Class name defined in the css file

anyOf.description:
This object has the following properties as optional:
- id: Label for the id attribute for the component
- class: Class name defined in the css file for this component.

isTotal.description: True if want to display total below the table in the last row

isDownload.description: True if want to download the table data csv file

versionChooserDisabled.description: To show/hide the version select input

headerInfo.description:
The following fields are optional in this object.
    - isTotalRequired: True if want to display the sum of column numbers below the table.
    - sorting: True if sorting required on the column.
    - alignment: Alignment of the data (start or end)

versionData.description: Release name, source csv file and version number

items.description: colspan and rowspan are optional fields. Add appropriate number to span the cells accordingly.

additionalHeaders.description: Additional column names and definitions if any

cellHeaders.description: Additional column names and definitions if any

anyOf.description:
This object has the following properties as optional:
- additionalHeaders: Add details here to display additional table header for the table.
- cellHeaders: Add details here to display cell headers for the table.

type.description: Properties 'class' and 'styles' are optional. Add styling in styles to apply styles to the title.

class.description: Class name defined in the css file

anyOf.description: Properties 'class' and 'styles' are optional. Add styling in styles to apply styles to the title.
